MemberSignature.Value: public virtual Android.Graphics.Bitmap DefaultVideoPoster { get; }
.property instance class Android.Graphics.Bitmap DefaultVideoPoster

Docs.summary: When not playing, video elements are represented by a 'poster' image.

remarks.para: When not playing, video elements are represented by a 'poster' image. The image to use can be specified by the poster attribute of the video tag in HTML. If the attribute is absent, then a default poster will be used. This method allows the ChromeClient to provide that default image.

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnCloseWindow(class Android.Webkit.WebView window) cil managed

Docs.param: The WebView that needs to be closed.
Docs.summary: Notify the host application to close the given WebView and remove it from the view system if necessary.

remarks.para: Notify the host application to close the given WebView and remove it from the view system if necessary. At this point, WebCore has stopped any loading in this window and has removed any cross-scripting ability in javascript.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool OnCreateWindow (Android.Webkit.WebView view, bool isDialog, bool isUserGesture, Android.OS.Message resultMsg);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool OnCreateWindow(class Android.Webkit.WebView view, bool isDialog, bool isUserGesture, class Android.OS.Message resultMsg) cil managed

Docs.param: The WebView from which the request for a new window originated.
True if the new window should be a dialog, rather than a full-size window.
True if the request was initiated by a user gesture, such as the user clicking a link.
The message to send when once a new WebView has been created. resultMsg.obj is a object. This should be used to transport the new WebView, by calling .
Docs.summary: Request the host application to create a new window.

remarks.para: Request the host application to create a new window. If the host application chooses to honor this request, it should return true from this method, create a new WebView to host the window, insert it into the View system and send the supplied resultMsg message to its target with the new WebView as an argument. If the host application chooses not to honor the request, it should return false from this method. The default implementation of this method does nothing and hence returns false.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void OnExceededDatabaseQuota (string url, string databaseIdentifier, long quota, long estimatedDatabaseSize, long totalQuota, Android.Webkit.WebStorage.IQuotaUpdater quotaUpdater);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnExceededDatabaseQuota(string url, string databaseIdentifier, int64 quota, int64 estimatedDatabaseSize, int64 totalQuota, class Android.Webkit.WebStorage/IQuotaUpdater quotaUpdater) cil managed

Docs.param: The URL of the page that triggered the notification
The identifier of the database where the quota was exceeded.
The quota for the origin, in bytes
The estimated size of the offending database, in bytes
The total quota for all origins, in bytes
An instance of which must be used to inform the WebView of the new quota.
Docs.summary: Tell the client that the quota has been exceeded for the Web SQL Database API for a particular origin and request a new quota.

remarks.para:
Tell the client that the quota has been exceeded for the Web SQL Database API for a particular origin and request a new quota. The client must respond by invoking the
method of the supplied instance. The minimum value that can be set for the new quota is the current quota. The default implementation responds with the current quota, so the quota will not be increased.

Notify the host application that a request for Geolocation permissions, made with a previous call to
has been canceled.

remarks.para:
Notify the host application that a request for Geolocation permissions, made with a previous call to
has been canceled. Any related UI should therefore be hidden.

Docs.param: The origin of the web content attempting to use the Geolocation API.
The callback to use to set the permission state for the origin.
Docs.summary: Notify the host application that web content from the specified origin is attempting to use the Geolocation API, but no permission state is currently set for that origin.

remarks.para: Notify the host application that web content from the specified origin is attempting to use the Geolocation API, but no permission state is currently set for that origin. The host application should invoke the specified callback with the desired permission state. See for details.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void OnHideCustomView ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnHideCustomView() cil managed

Docs.summary: Notify the host application that the current page has exited full screen mode.

remarks.para: Notify the host application that the current page has exited full screen mode. The host application must hide the custom View, ie. the View passed to when the content entered fullscreen. Also see "Full screen support" documentation on .

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool OnJsAlert (Android.Webkit.WebView view, string url, string message, Android.Webkit.JsResult result);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool OnJsAlert(class Android.Webkit.WebView view, string url, string message, class Android.Webkit.JsResult result) cil managed

Docs.param: The WebView that initiated the callback.
The url of the page requesting the dialog.
Message to be displayed in the window.
A JsResult to confirm that the user hit enter.
Docs.summary: Tell the client to display a javascript alert dialog.

remarks.para: Tell the client to display a javascript alert dialog. If the client returns true, WebView will assume that the client will handle the dialog. If the client returns false, it will continue execution.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool OnJsBeforeUnload (Android.Webkit.WebView view, string url, string message, Android.Webkit.JsResult result);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool OnJsBeforeUnload(class Android.Webkit.WebView view, string url, string message, class Android.Webkit.JsResult result) cil managed

Docs.param: The WebView that initiated the callback.
The url of the page requesting the dialog.
Message to be displayed in the window.
A JsResult used to send the user's response to javascript.
Docs.summary: Tell the client to display a dialog to confirm navigation away from the current page.

remarks.para: Tell the client to display a dialog to confirm navigation away from the current page. This is the result of the onbeforeunload javascript event. If the client returns true, WebView will assume that the client will handle the confirm dialog and call the appropriate JsResult method. If the client returns false, a default value of true will be returned to javascript to accept navigation away from the current page. The default behavior is to return false. Setting the JsResult to true will navigate away from the current page, false will cancel the navigation.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool OnJsConfirm (Android.Webkit.WebView view, string url, string message, Android.Webkit.JsResult result);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool OnJsConfirm(class Android.Webkit.WebView view, string url, string message, class Android.Webkit.JsResult result) cil managed

Docs.param: The WebView that initiated the callback.
The url of the page requesting the dialog.
Message to be displayed in the window.
A JsResult used to send the user's response to javascript.
Docs.summary: Tell the client to display a confirm dialog to the user.

remarks.para: Tell the client to display a confirm dialog to the user. If the client returns true, WebView will assume that the client will handle the confirm dialog and call the appropriate JsResult method. If the client returns false, a default value of false will be returned to javascript. The default behavior is to return false.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool OnJsPrompt (Android.Webkit.WebView view, string url, string message, string defaultValue, Android.Webkit.JsPromptResult result);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool OnJsPrompt(class Android.Webkit.WebView view, string url, string message, string defaultValue, class Android.Webkit.JsPromptResult result) cil managed

Docs.param: The WebView that initiated the callback.
The url of the page requesting the dialog.
Message to be displayed in the window.
The default value displayed in the prompt dialog.
A JsPromptResult used to send the user's reponse to javascript.
Docs.summary: Tell the client to display a prompt dialog to the user.

remarks.para: Tell the client to display a prompt dialog to the user. If the client returns true, WebView will assume that the client will handle the prompt dialog and call the appropriate JsPromptResult method. If the client returns false, a default value of false will be returned to to javascript. The default behavior is to return false.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool OnJsTimeout ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool OnJsTimeout() cil managed

Docs.summary: Tell the client that a JavaScript execution timeout has occured.

remarks.para: Tell the client that a JavaScript execution timeout has occured. And the client may decide whether or not to interrupt the execution. If the client returns true, the JavaScript will be interrupted. If the client returns false, the execution will continue. Note that in the case of continuing execution, the timeout counter will be reset, and the callback will continue to occur if the script does not finish at the next check point.

Docs.summary: Notify the host application that web content is requesting permission to access the specified resources and the permission currently isn't granted or denied.

remarks.para:
Notify the host application that web content is requesting permission to access the specified resources and the permission currently isn't granted or denied. The host application must invoke or .
If this method isn't overridden, the permission is denied.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void OnReachedMaxAppCacheSize (long requiredStorage, long quota, Android.Webkit.WebStorage.IQuotaUpdater quotaUpdater);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnReachedMaxAppCacheSize(int64 requiredStorage, int64 quota, class Android.Webkit.WebStorage/IQuotaUpdater quotaUpdater) cil managed

Docs.param: The amount of storage required by the Application Cache operation that triggered this notification, in bytes.
the current maximum Application Cache size, in bytes
An instance of which must be used to inform the WebView of the new quota.
Docs.summary: Notify the host application that the Application Cache has reached the maximum size.

remarks.para:
Notify the host application that the Application Cache has reached the maximum size. The client must respond by invoking the
method of the supplied instance. The minimum value that can be set for the new quota is the current quota. The default implementation responds with the current quota, so the quota will not be increased.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override IntPtr ThresholdClass { get; }
.property instance native int ThresholdClass

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which contains the java.lang.Class JNI value corresponding to this type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control which jclass is provided to methods like .

MemberSignature.Value: protected override Type ThresholdType { get; }
.property instance class System.Type ThresholdType

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which provides the declaring type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control virtual vs. non virtual method dispatch against the underlying JNI object. When this property is equal to the declaring type, then virtual method invocation against the JNI object is performed; otherwise, we assume that the method was overridden by a derived type, and perform non-virtual methdo invocation.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual Android.Views.View VideoLoadingProgressView { get; }
.property instance class Android.Views.View VideoLoadingProgressView

Docs.summary: Obtains a View to be displayed while buffering of full screen video is taking place.

remarks.para: Obtains a View to be displayed while buffering of full screen video is taking place. The host application can override this method to provide a View containing a spinner or similar.
